attributes.action: Regulate and reduce gambling and casino advertising on all media platforms
attributes.additional_details:
Gambling addiction is a serious concern that deeply affects millions of individuals and families. In a world where gambling is increasingly accessible and aggressively marketed.

Constant advertisements on radio, TV, newspapers, and streaming platforms only exacerbates this issue, creating an environment where the vulnerable are perpetually tempted and triggered. How are individuals expected to recover when the very vice they are struggling to overcome is relentlessly promoted at every turn?
attributes.background: This is a call for action from regulators to step up and enact protections that prevent exploitative marketing tactics from constantly preying on those fighting to regain control of their lives.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Ban all gambling ads from social media, TV and all other platforms
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740167

Ban gambling advertising on TV
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731145
